lom:description.lom:string: "The Department of Petroleum Engineering offers Graduate Degree Programs and course work at both the Masters and Doctoral level. The graduate program in Petroleum Engineering at Texas A&M University is recognized for excellence in teaching and research both nationally and internationally, and currently includes students from 30 countries! This program is consistently rated as one of the best graduate programs in Petroleum Engineering by U.S. News and World Report."

lom:title.lom:string: Graduate Petroleum Engineering Curriculum - Texas A&M
